titles.title: Nino's Act
A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide Medicaid coverage of drugs prescribed for certain research study child participants.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2082-2083)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
2/10/2009--Introduced.
Nino's Act - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide for mandatory Medicaid coverage of drugs prescribed for certain research study child participants, regardless of Medicaid eligibility otherwise, if the state provides drug coverage.
